name: Ages Of Madness: The Game (Canceled)
blurb: The horror breeds under your skin.

rewards.reward: Everyone at Lince Studios loves you! Every backer for this level or more will receive a GUEST ACCESS to our AGES OF MADNESS forum. We want to invite you to our forums where you get a place to speculate about the game and see its progress.
GUEST ACCESS to the AGES OF MADNESS forum plus a 1 DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF "AGES OF MADNESS" the videogame.
GUEST ACCESS to the AGES OF MADNESS forum, 1 DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF "AGES OF MADNESS" videogame plus the MAIN MUSIC THEME and the ARTWORK BOOK in PDF format.

GUEST ACCESS to the AGES OF MADNESS forum, 1 DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF "AGES OF MADNESS" videogame, the MAIN MUSIC THEME, the ARTWORK BOOK (PDF) plus a Ori Novella's horror book named "LEGENDS OF LENHUMA" (PDF format) inspired by Lovecraft's works.

TESTER ACCESS to the AGES OF MADNESS forum, 1 DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF "AGES OF MADNESS" videogame, the MAIN MUSIC THEME, the ARTWORK BOOK (PDF), Ori Novella's "LEGENDS OF LENHUMA" book (PDF format) plus a BETA KEY for the game.

Lovecraft's death
